Package index

Coords and Waypoints

Create “coords” and ’waypoints” objects.

as_coords() `latlon<-`()
Geographic Coordinate Class
as_waypoints()
Geographic Waypoint Class

Convert

Convert between (i) decimal degrees, (ii) degrees and minutes, and (iii) degrees, minutes and seconds.

convert()
Convert the Format of "coords" and "waypoints" Objects

Validate and Review

Validate geographic locations and identify individual invalid values.

validate()
Validate Coords or Waypoints
review()
Review Coordinates and Waypoints Validity

Format and Print

Neat formatting and printing of “coords” and “waypoints”.

print(<coords>) print(<waypoints>) format(<coords>) format(<waypoints>) ll_headers()
Format and Print Coords or Waypoints

Extract and Replace

Methods to extract or replace subsets of “coords” objects.

`[`(<coords>) `[<-`(<coords>)
Extract or Replace Parts of a Coords Object

Other

`%L%`
Operator Providing Alternative to Zero-Length Object

About

Waypoint-package Waypoint
Convert, Validate, Format and Print Geographic Coordinates and Waypoints
